intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: When do you go to bed?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. You see a shirt.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Would you like coffee or tea?

respond_situations.description: You are lost in the street.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of an item.
You want to ask about homework. You ask your teacher. ..

listening_script.text: I wake up in the morning. I wear a shirt and pants. I put on my socks. I wear my shoes. I look in the mirror.

monologue.topic: Talk about things you want to learn

follow_up_questions.question: What do you want to learn?
Why do you want to learn this?
When do you want to start learning?
